meanings.sent1: The zoic behavior of the cat showed its love for chasing mice.
meanings.sent2: The zoo is a zoic place where many different animals live.
meanings.sent3: The zoic squirrel made friends with all the birds in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her zoic instincts kicked in when she saw the injured puppy.
meanings.sent5: The zoic sounds of the jungle at night were both eerie and fascinating.

meanings.definition: Living or growing in association with animals
meanings.sent1: The zoic plants near the pond provide shelter for frogs and insects.
meanings.sent2: The farm is a zoic environment with cows, chickens, and pigs.
meanings.sent3: The zoic vines intertwined with the tree branches, creating a natural playground for monkeys.
meanings.sent4: Her friendship with the zoic creatures of the forest brought her great joy.
meanings.sent5: The zoic ecosystem of the coral reef is delicate and beautiful.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to a specific geological era characterized by the presence of animal life
meanings.sent1: The zoic period marked the beginning of abundant animal diversity on Earth.
meanings.sent2: Fossils from the zoic era provide valuable insights into ancient animal species.
meanings.sent3: The zoic landscape was filled with creatures unlike any seen before.
meanings.sent4: The zoic rocks contained imprints of long-extinct animals.
meanings.sent5: The zoic era was a time of great transformation and evolution.
